Sricharan Chiruvolu

Avid keep-calmer. Super nerd. Loves Computers. Into smart people, provocative thinking and fresh perspectives on developing stuff.

Born at a very young age, Sricharan is 21 years old. He is currently pursuing a CS undergrad and lives in Bangalore, IN.

In his free time, Sricharan enjoys sitcoms, reads Manga and watches Anime.
